properties.description: Tues-Sat is our cafe, the Sunday times are our service (plus coffee afterwards). You are welcome to use the cafe but not buy or, if you prefer, ask for "a tea for Henry" and it'll be on the house. Cafe closed for 2 weeks over Christmas and New Year.

properties.address: Hunter Street, Chester CH1 2AR
properties.description: We cater for the whole community - this house is your house. There are book clubs, writing groups, craft sessions, support groups, English conversation sessions, help with technology, free activities for children and young people, and much more. Storyhouse is a cultural hub in the centre of Chester with two theatres, a cinema, library, and restaurant. There is study space, free WiFi access, and community groups to join. We can also signpost you to other support services you might need.
properties.title: Storyhouse
